"trusted_key_list"
{
	//
	// This file lists public keys that are trusted by the server.
	// It should usually only contain official Crowbar Collective public keys,
	// so don't modify it.
	//
	// See trusted_key_example.txt for how you can add keys issues
	// by third parties, in order to add their content to the list
	// of trusted content.
	//

	// Official Black Mesa content.
	public_key
	{
		type "rsa"
		rsa_public_key ""
	}
}
